verses.name: Ezekiel 21:4
verses.text: Seeing then that I will cut off from thee the righteous and the wicked, therefore shall my sword go forth out of his sheath against all flesh from the south to the north:

verses.name: Ezekiel 21:5
verses.text: That all flesh may know that I the Lord have drawn forth my sword out of his sheath: it shall not return any more.

verses.name: Ezekiel 21:6
verses.text: Sigh therefore, thou son of man, with the breaking of thy loins; and with bitterness sigh before their eyes.
